snippet.title: A Foretold Affair Trailer
snippet.description:
The promotional trailer for A Foretold Affair, a steampunk adventure Visual Novel developed by GB Patch Games.

Get the game on Steam or Itch.io!
STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/586670/A_Foretold_Affair/
ITCH: https://gbpatch.itch.io/a-foretold-affair

And feel free to check out our social media pages-
PATREON: https://www.patreon.com/gbpatch
TUMBLR: https://gb-patch.tumblr.com/
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/patch_games
DISCORD COMMUNITY: https://discord.gg/Q9YvQx2
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/GBPatchGames

As a future seer, you know exactly who you're going to spend the rest of your life with. Unfortunately, it seems convincing them on that matter might not be so simple. Come to enjoy the journey in this amusing, exciting, and touching Visual Novel. 

The trailer was created by the talented aryaford
